activities.name: upload_if_validation_succeeds
activities.description: Checks the number of errors against the configured validation error threshold (note that 1 is subtracted to account for the header in the validation.log)

subject.value: ADF: SDS upload validation failed for @{pipeline().parameters.directory}

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{SIS ID} as string,
		Name as string,
		{School Number} as string,
		{School NCES_ID} as string,
		{State ID} as string,
		{Grade Low} as string,
		{Grade High} as string,
		{Principal SIS ID} as string,
		{Principal Name} as string,
		{Principal Secondary Email} as string,
		Address as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		Country as string,
		Zip as string,
		Phone as string,
		Zone as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourceSchoolsCsv
source(output(
		{SIS ID} as string,
		{School SIS ID} as string,
		{First Name} as string,
		{Last Name} as string,
		Username as string,
		Password as string,
		{State ID} as string,
		{Secondary Email} as string,
		{Student Number} as string,
		{Middle Name} as string,
		Grade as string,
		Status as string,
		Birthdate as string,
		{Graduation Year} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourceStudentCsv
source(output(
		{SIS ID} as string,
		{School SIS ID} as string,
		{First Name} as string,
		{Last Name} as string,
		Username as string,
		Password as string,
		{State ID} as string,
		{Teacher Number} as string,
		Status as string,
		{Middle Name} as string,
		{Secondary Email} as string,
		Title as string,
		Qualification as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourceTeacherCsv
source(output(
		{Section SIS ID} as string,
		{SIS ID} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourceStudentEnrollmentCsv
source(output(
		{Section SIS ID} as string,
		{SIS ID} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourceTeacherRosterCsv
source(output(
		{SIS ID} as string,
		{School SIS ID} as string,
		{Section Name} as string,
		{Section Number} as string,
		{Term SIS ID} as string,
		{Term Name} as string,
		{Term StartDate} as string,
		{Term EndDate} as string,
		{Course SIS ID} as string,
		{Course Name} as string,
		{Course Number} as string,
		{Course Description} as string,
		{Course Subject} as string,
		Periods as string,
		Status as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourceSectionCsv
sourceSchoolsCsv derive(invalidSISID = isNull({SIS ID}) || length({SIS ID}) == 0,
		invalidName = isNull(Name) || length({Name}) == 0) ~> schoolValidations
ConditionalSplit1@invalidSchoolRecords derive(type = "school",
		errors = concat(
    iif(invalidSISID, 'Invalid SIS ID; ', ''), 
    iif(invalidName, 'Invalid Name; ', '')
),
		sisId = {SIS ID}) ~> schoolErrors
schoolValidations split(invalidSISID || invalidName,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(invalidSchoolRecords, validSchoolRecords)
sourceStudentCsv derive(invalidSISID = isNull({SIS ID}) || length({SIS ID}) == 0,
		invalidSchoolSISID = isNull({School SIS ID}) || length({School SIS ID}) == 0,
		invalidUsername = isNull(Username) || length(Username) == 0,
		invalidFirstName = isNull({First Name}) || length({First Name}) == 0,
		invalidLastName = isNull({Last Name}) || length({Last Name}) == 0) ~> studentValidations
studentValidations split(invalidSISID || invalidSchoolSISID ||invalidUsername || invalidFirstName || invalidLastName,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit8@(invalidStudentRecords, validStudentRecords)
ConditionalSplit8@invalidStudentRecords derive(type = "student",
		errors = concat(
    iif(invalidSISID, 'Invalid SIS ID; ', ''), 
    iif(invalidSchoolSISID, 'Invalid School SIS ID; ', ''),
    iif(invalidUsername, 'Invalid Username; ', ''),
    iif(invalidFirstName, 'Invalid First Name; ', ''),
    iif(invalidLastName, 'Invalid Last Name; ', '')
),
		sisId = {SIS ID}) ~> studentErrors
sourceTeacherCsv derive(invalidSISID = isNull({SIS ID}) || length({SIS ID}) == 0,
		invalidSchoolSISID = isNull({School SIS ID}) || length({School SIS ID}) == 0,
		invalidUsername = isNull(Username) || length(Username) == 0 || !regexMatch(Username, `^[A-za-z0-9.\\-_!#~^\\\\\u0027]{1,64}$`),
		invalidFirstName = isNull({First Name}) || length({First Name}) == 0,
		invalidLastName = isNull({Last Name}) || length({Last Name}) == 0) ~> teacherValidations
teacherValidations split(invalidSISID || invalidSchoolSISID || invalidUsername || invalidFirstName || invalidLastName,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit2@(invalidTeacherRecords, validTeacherRecords)
ConditionalSplit2@invalidTeacherRecords derive(sisId = {SIS ID},
		type = "teacher",
		errors = concat(
    iif(invalidSISID, 'Invalid SIS ID; ', ''), 
    iif(invalidSchoolSISID, 'Invalid School SIS ID; ', ''),
    iif(invalidUsername, 'Invalid Username; ', ''),
    iif(invalidFirstName, 'Invalid First Name; ', ''),
    iif(invalidLastName, 'Invalid Last Name; ', '')
)) ~> teacherErrors
sourceStudentEnrollmentCsv derive(invalidSISID = isNull({SIS ID}) || length({SIS ID}) == 0,
		invalidSectionSISID = isNull({Section SIS ID}) || length({Section SIS ID}) == 0 || !regexMatch({Section SIS ID}, `^[a-zA-Z0-9_.\u0027-]+$`)) ~> enrollmentValidations
ConditionalSplit4@invalidEnrollments derive(sisId = {SIS ID},
		type = "studentenrollment",
		errors = concat(
    iif(invalidSISID, 'Invalid SIS ID; ', ''), 
    iif(invalidSectionSISID, 'Invalid Section SIS ID; ', '')
)) ~> enrollmentErrors
sourceTeacherRosterCsv derive(invalidSISID = isNull({SIS ID}) || length({SIS ID}) == 0,
		invalidSectionSISID = isNull({Section SIS ID}) || length({Section SIS ID}) == 0 || !regexMatch({Section SIS ID}, `^[a-zA-Z0-9_.\u0027-]+$`)) ~> rosterValidations
ConditionalSplit3@invalidTeacherRosterRecords derive(sisId = {SIS ID},
		type = "teacherroster",
		errors = concat(
    iif(invalidSISID, 'Invalid SIS ID; ', ''), 
    iif(invalidSectionSISID, 'Invalid Section SIS ID; ', '')
)) ~> teacherRosterErrors
schoolErrors, studentErrors, teacherErrors, enrollmentErrors, teacherRosterErrors, sectionErrors union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 derive(date = currentUTC()) ~> addDate
rosterValidations split(invalidSISID || invalidSectionSISID,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit3@(invalidTeacherRosterRecords, validTeacherRosterRecords)
enrollmentValidations split(invalidSISID || invalidSectionSISID,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit4@(invalidEnrollments, validEnrollments)
sourceSectionCsv derive(invalidSISID = isNull({SIS ID}) || length({SIS ID}) == 0,
		invalidSchoolSISID = isNull({School SIS ID}) || length({School SIS ID}) == 0,
		invalidSectionName = isNull({Section Name}) || length({Section Name}) == 0) ~> sectionValidations
sectionValidations split(invalidSISID || invalidSchoolSISID || invalidSectionName,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit9@(invalidSectionRecords, validSectionRecords)
ConditionalSplit9@invalidSectionRecords derive(sisId = {SIS ID},
		type = "section",
		errors = concat(
    iif(invalidSISID, 'Invalid SIS ID; ', ''), 
    iif(invalidSchoolSISID, 'Invalid Section SIS ID; ', ''),
    iif(invalidSectionName, 'Invalid Section Name; ', '')
)) ~> sectionErrors
ConditionalSplit9@validSectionRecords, ConditionalSplit1@validSchoolRecords join({School SIS ID} == ConditionalSplit1@validSchoolRecords@{SIS ID},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSchool
RenameSectionColumns, ConditionalSplit3@validTeacherRosterRecords join(RenameSectionColumns@{Section SIS ID} == ConditionalSplit3@validTeacherRosterRecords@{Section SIS ID},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinTeacherRoster
RenameWithTeacherId, ConditionalSplit2@validTeacherRecords join({Teacher SIS ID} == {SIS ID},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinTeacher
DedupSectionRecords, validEnrollmentsWithValidStudentsFinal join(DedupSectionRecords@{Section SIS ID} == validEnrollmentsWithValidStudentsFinal@{Section SIS ID},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinStudentEnrollments
RenameWithTeacherUsername aggregate(groupBy({Section SIS ID}),
	each(match(!in(['Section SIS ID'],name)), $$ = first($$))) ~> DedupSectionRecords
JoinTeacher select(mapColumn(
		{Section SIS ID},
		{School SIS ID} = RenameWithTeacherId@{School SIS ID},
		{Section Name},
		{Section Number},
		{Term SIS ID},
		{Term Name},
		{Term StartDate},
		{Term EndDate},
		{Course SIS ID},
		{Course Name},
		{Course Number},
		{Course Description},
		{Course Subject},
		Periods,
		Status = RenameWithTeacherId@Status,
		{Teacher SIS ID},
		{Teacher Username} = Username
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameWithTeacherUsername
JoinSchool select(mapColumn(
		{Section SIS ID} = ConditionalSplit9@validSectionRecords@{SIS ID},
		{School SIS ID},
		{Section Name},
		{Section Number},
		{Term SIS ID},
		{Term Name},
		{Term StartDate},
		{Term EndDate},
		{Course SIS ID},
		{Course Name},
		{Course Number},
		{Course Description},
		{Course Subject},
		Periods,
		Status
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameSectionColumns
JoinTeacherRoster select(mapColumn(
		{Section SIS ID} = RenameSectionColumns@{Section SIS ID},
		{School SIS ID},
		{Section Name},
		{Section Number},
		{Term SIS ID},
		{Term Name},
		{Term StartDate},
		{Term EndDate},
		{Course SIS ID},
		{Course Name},
		{Course Number},
		{Course Description},
		{Course Subject},
		Periods,
		Status,
		{Teacher SIS ID} = {SIS ID}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameWithTeacherId
ConditionalSplit4@validEnrollments, ConditionalSplit8@validStudentRecords join(ConditionalSplit4@validEnrollments@{SIS ID} == ConditionalSplit8@validStudentRecords@{SIS ID},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> validEnrollmentsWithValidStudents
validEnrollmentsWithValidStudents select(mapColumn(
		{Section SIS ID},
		{Student SIS ID} = ConditionalSplit8@validStudentRecords@{SIS ID}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> validEnrollmentsWithValidStudentsFinal
addDate sink(input(
		date as string,
		schoolId as string,
		type as string,
		sisId as string,
		errors as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['validation.log'],
	mapColumn(
		date,
		type,
		errors,
		sisId
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sinkValidationErrorsCsv
DedupSectionRecords sink(input(
		{SIS ID} as string,
		{School SIS ID} as string,
		{Section Name} as string,
		{Section Number} as string,
		{Term SIS ID} as string,
		{Term Name} as string,
		{Term StartDate} as string,
		{Term EndDate} as string,
		{Course SIS ID} as string,
		{Course Name} as string,
		{Course Number} as string,
		{Course Description} as string,
		{Course Subject} as string,
		Periods as string,
		Status as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['section.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		{SIS ID} = {Section SIS ID},
		{School SIS ID},
		{Section Name},
		{Section Number},
		{Term SIS ID},
		{Term Name},
		{Term StartDate},
		{Term EndDate},
		{Course SIS ID},
		{Course Name},
		{Course Number},
		{Course Description},
		{Course Subject},
		Periods,
		Status
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkValidatedSectionCsv
ConditionalSplit1@validSchoolRecords sink(input(
		{SIS ID} as string,
		Name as string,
		{School Number} as string,
		{School NCES_ID} as string,
		{State ID} as string,
		{Grade Low} as string,
		{Grade High} as string,
		{Principal SIS ID} as string,
		{Principal Name} as string,
		{Principal Secondary Email} as string,
		Address as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		Country as string,
		Zip as string,
		Phone as string,
		Zone as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['school.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		{SIS ID},
		Name,
		{School Number},
		{School NCES_ID},
		{State ID},
		{Grade Low},
		{Grade High},
		{Principal SIS ID},
		{Principal Name},
		{Principal Secondary Email},
		Address,
		City,
		State,
		Country,
		Zip,
		Phone,
		Zone
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkValidatedSchoolCsv
ConditionalSplit8@validStudentRecords sink(input(
		{SIS ID} as string,
		{School SIS ID} as string,
		{First Name} as string,
		{Last Name} as string,
		Username as string,
		Password as string,
		{State ID} as string,
		{Secondary Email} as string,
		{Student Number} as string,
		{Middle Name} as string,
		Grade as string,
		Status as string,
		Birthdate as string,
		{Graduation Year} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['student.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		{SIS ID},
		{School SIS ID},
		{First Name},
		{Last Name},
		Username,
		Password,
		{State ID},
		{Secondary Email},
		{Student Number},
		{Middle Name},
		Grade,
		Status,
		Birthdate,
		{Graduation Year}
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkValidatedStudentCsv
ConditionalSplit2@validTeacherRecords sink(input(
		{SIS ID} as string,
		{School SIS ID} as string,
		{First Name} as string,
		{Last Name} as string,
		Username as string,
		Password as string,
		{State ID} as string,
		{Teacher Number} as string,
		Status as string,
		{Middle Name} as string,
		{Secondary Email} as string,
		Title as string,
		Qualification as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['teacher.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		{SIS ID},
		{School SIS ID},
		{First Name},
		{Last Name},
		Username,
		Password,
		{State ID},
		{Teacher Number},
		Status,
		{Middle Name},
		{Secondary Email},
		Title,
		Qualification
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkValidatedTeacherCsv
RenameWithTeacherUsername sink(input(
		{Section SIS ID} as string,
		{SIS ID} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['teacherroster.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		{SIS ID} = {Teacher SIS ID},
		{Section SIS ID}
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkValidatedTeacherRosterCsv
JoinStudentEnrollments sink(input(
		{Section SIS ID} as string,
		{SIS ID} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['studentenrollment.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		{Section SIS ID} = DedupSectionRecords@{Section SIS ID},
		{SIS ID} = {Student SIS ID}
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkValidatedStudentEnrollmentsCsv
ConditionalSplit1@invalidSchoolRecords sink(input(
		{SIS ID} as string,
		Name as string,
		{School Number} as string,
		{School NCES_ID} as string,
		{State ID} as string,
		{Grade Low} as string,
		{Grade High} as string,
		{Principal SIS ID} as string,
		{Principal Name} as string,
		{Principal Secondary Email} as string,
		Address as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		Country as string,
		Zip as string,
		Phone as string,
		Zone as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['invalid_school_records.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		{SIS ID},
		Name,
		{School Number},
		{School NCES_ID},
		{State ID},
		{Grade Low},
		{Grade High},
		{Principal SIS ID},
		{Principal Name},
		{Principal Secondary Email},
		Address,
		City,
		State,
		Country,
		Zip,
		Phone,
		Zone
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkInvalidSchoolCsv
ConditionalSplit8@invalidStudentRecords sink(input(
		{SIS ID} as string,
		{School SIS ID} as string,
		{First Name} as string,
		{Last Name} as string,
		Username as string,
		Password as string,
		{State ID} as string,
		{Secondary Email} as string,
		{Student Number} as string,
		{Middle Name} as string,
		Grade as string,
		Status as string,
		Birthdate as string,
		{Graduation Year} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['invalid_student_records.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		{SIS ID},
		{School SIS ID},
		{First Name},
		{Last Name},
		Username,
		Password,
		{State ID},
		{Secondary Email},
		{Student Number},
		{Middle Name},
		Grade,
		Status,
		Birthdate,
		{Graduation Year}
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkInvalidStudentCsv
ConditionalSplit2@invalidTeacherRecords sink(input(
		{SIS ID} as string,
		{School SIS ID} as string,
		{First Name} as string,
		{Last Name} as string,
		Username as string,
		Password as string,
		{State ID} as string,
		{Teacher Number} as string,
		Status as string,
		{Middle Name} as string,
		{Secondary Email} as string,
		Title as string,
		Qualification as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['invalid_teacher_records.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		{SIS ID},
		{School SIS ID},
		{First Name},
		{Last Name},
		Username,
		Password,
		{State ID},
		{Teacher Number},
		Status,
		{Middle Name},
		{Secondary Email},
		Title,
		Qualification
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkInvalidTeacherCsv
ConditionalSplit4@invalidEnrollments sink(input(
		{Section SIS ID} as string,
		{SIS ID} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['invalid_studentenrollment_records.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		{Section SIS ID},
		{SIS ID}
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkInvalidEnrollments
ConditionalSplit3@invalidTeacherRosterRecords sink(input(
		{Section SIS ID} as string,
		{SIS ID} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['invalid_teacherroster_records.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		{Section SIS ID},
		{SIS ID}
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkInvalidTeacherRosterCsv
ConditionalSplit9@invalidSectionRecords sink(input(
		{SIS ID} as string,
		{School SIS ID} as string,
		{Section Name} as string,
		{Section Number} as string,
		{Term SIS ID} as string,
		{Term Name} as string,
		{Term StartDate} as string,
		{Term EndDate} as string,
		{Course SIS ID} as string,
		{Course Name} as string,
		{Course Number} as string,
		{Course Description} as string,
		{Course Subject} as string,
		Periods as string,
		Status as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['invalid_section_records.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		{SIS ID},
		{School SIS ID},
		{Section Name},
		{Section Number},
		{Term SIS ID},
		{Term Name},
		{Term StartDate},
		{Term EndDate},
		{Course SIS ID},
		{Course Name},
		{Course Number},
		{Course Description},
		{Course Subject},
		Periods,
		Status
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkInvalidSectionCsv

properties.description: Splits the incoming set of SDS formatted csv files into 3 separate sets, and writes out the resulting sets of csv files to folders called profile1, profile2, and profile3

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{SIS ID} as string,
		Name as string,
		{School Number} as string,
		{School NCES_ID} as string,
		{State ID} as string,
		{Grade Low} as string,
		{Grade High} as string,
		{Principal SIS ID} as string,
		{Principal Name} as string,
		{Principal Secondary Email} as string,
		Address as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		Country as string,
		Zip as string,
		Phone as string,
		Zone as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourceSchoolsCsv
source(output(
		{SIS ID} as string,
		{School SIS ID} as string,
		{First Name} as string,
		{Last Name} as string,
		Username as string,
		Password as string,
		{State ID} as string,
		{Secondary Email} as string,
		{Student Number} as string,
		{Middle Name} as string,
		Grade as string,
		Status as string,
		Birthdate as string,
		{Graduation Year} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourceStudentCsv
source(output(
		{SIS ID} as string,
		{School SIS ID} as string,
		{First Name} as string,
		{Last Name} as string,
		Username as string,
		Password as string,
		{State ID} as string,
		{Teacher Number} as string,
		Status as string,
		{Middle Name} as string,
		{Secondary Email} as string,
		Title as string,
		Qualification as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourceTeacherCsv
source(output(
		{Section SIS ID} as string,
		{SIS ID} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourceStudentEnrollmentCsv
source(output(
		{Section SIS ID} as string,
		{SIS ID} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourceTeacherRosterCsv
source(output(
		{SIS ID} as string,
		{School SIS ID} as string,
		{Section Name} as string,
		{Section Number} as string,
		{Term SIS ID} as string,
		{Term Name} as string,
		{Term StartDate} as string,
		{Term EndDate} as string,
		{Course SIS ID} as string,
		{Course Name} as string,
		{Course Number} as string,
		{Course Description} as string,
		{Course Subject} as string,
		Periods as string,
		Status as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourceSectionCsv
sourceSchoolsCsv split({SIS ID} == 'sch1' || {SIS ID} == 'sch2',
	{SIS ID} == 'sch3',
	disjoint: false) ~> splitSchools@(profile1, profile2, remainder)
sourceStudentCsv split({School SIS ID} == 'sch1' || {School SIS ID} == 'sch2',
	{School SIS ID} == 'sch3',
	disjoint: false) ~> splitStudents@(profile1, profile2, remainder)
sourceTeacherCsv split({School SIS ID} == 'sch1' || {School SIS ID} == 'sch2',
	{School SIS ID} == 'sch3',
	disjoint: false) ~> splitTeachers@(profile1, profile2, remainder)
sourceStudentEnrollmentCsv, sourceSectionCsv join({Section SIS ID} == sourceSectionCsv@{SIS ID},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 split({School SIS ID} == 'sch1' || {School SIS ID} == 'sch2',
	{School SIS ID} == 'sch3',
	disjoint: false) ~> splitEnrollments@(profile1, profile2, remainder)
sourceTeacherRosterCsv, sourceSectionCsv join({Section SIS ID} == sourceSectionCsv@{SIS ID},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join2 split({School SIS ID} == 'sch1' || {School SIS ID} == 'sch2',
	{School SIS ID} == 'sch3',
	disjoint: false) ~> splitTeacherroster@(profile1, profile2, remainder)
sourceSectionCsv split({School SIS ID} == 'sch1' || {School SIS ID} == 'sch2',
	{School SIS ID} == 'sch3',
	disjoint: false) ~> splitSections@(profile1, profile2, remainder)
splitSchools@profile1 sink(input(
		{SIS ID} as string,
		Name as string,
		{School Number} as string,
		{School NCES_ID} as string,
		{State ID} as string,
		{Grade Low} as string,
		{Grade High} as string,
		{Principal SIS ID} as string,
		{Principal Name} as string,
		{Principal Secondary Email} as string,
		Address as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		Country as string,
		Zip as string,
		Phone as string,
		Zone as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['school.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		{SIS ID},
		Name,
		{School Number},
		{School NCES_ID},
		{State ID},
		{Grade Low},
		{Grade High},
		{Principal SIS ID},
		{Principal Name},
		{Principal Secondary Email},
		Address,
		City,
		State,
		Country,
		Zip,
		Phone,
		Zone
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkSchoolCsvProfile1
splitSchools@profile2 sink(input(
		{SIS ID} as string,
		Name as string,
		{School Number} as string,
		{School NCES_ID} as string,
		{State ID} as string,
		{Grade Low} as string,
		{Grade High} as string,
		{Principal SIS ID} as string,
		{Principal Name} as string,
		{Principal Secondary Email} as string,
		Address as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,

activities.name: uploadCsvFilesToSDS
activities.description: Copies the sds formatted csv files into the SDS blob storage container for the configured sync profile.
